data.eml:eml: A new species of Eustigma (Hamamelidaceae) from Hon Ba Nature Reserve, Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Toyama, Hironori, Tagane, Shuichiro, Dang, Van Son, Tran, Hop, Nagamasu, Hidetoshi, Naiki, Akiyo, Yahara, Tetsukazu (2016): A new species of Eustigma (Hamamelidaceae) from Hon Ba Nature Reserve, Vietnam. PhytoKeys 65: 47-55, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.65.6726, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.65.6726
